definition: blue screen of death/computer crash screen

sentences.english: I want to get something out of my head but the computer freezes.
sentences.chinese: 我想倒出我腦子裏的想法但是電腦卻死機。

sentences.english: In the first computer class, some row of schoolmate's computer halted.
sentences.chinese: 一日上電腦課，有一排同學的電腦死機了。

sentences.english: Install the Blue Screen of Death screen-saver on someone’s computer.
sentences.chinese: 把別人的電腦屏保換成藍屏死機圖。

sentences.english: Life is sometimes just as puters, said crash will crash, not negotiable.
sentences.chinese: 人的生活有時就像電腦，說死機就死機，沒得磋商。

sentences.english: Life is sometimes just as puters, said crash will crash, not negotiable.
sentences.chinese: 人的生活有時就像電腦，說死機就死機，沒得磋商。
不合格品，如死機造成的藍屏。
如果投影儀死機了怎麼辦？

sentences.english: You may be presented with a BSOD, but just press X or O to restore settings.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到一個藍屏死機，而只是按X或O恢復設置。

sentences.english: Wondering why your computer just crashed again?
sentences.chinese: 還在爲你的計算機爲什麼老是死機而困擾嗎？

sentences.english: Install the Blue Screen of Death screen-saver on someone's computer.
sentences.chinese: 把別人的電腦屏保換成藍屏死機圖。

sentences.english: My computer crashed when I was almost finishing with my project.
sentences.chinese: 我就快要寫完我的作業了，可我的電腦死機了。

sentences.english: Fixed occasional crash after scoring a critical hit in the head with a Railway Rifle.
sentences.chinese: 修正射釘槍重擊爆頭後死機的問題。

definition: consecutive serial numbers/chain (of supermarkets, hotels etc)/hyphen
to order goods/to place an order
lit. to play the yu 竽 mouth organ to make up numbers (idiom); fig. to make up the numbers with inferior products/to masquerade as having an ability/token member of a group
to strip sb of their Party membership and government job (開除黨籍，開除公職|开除党籍，开除公职)
